title: Introducing H. Moser & Cie. Streamliner Perpetual Moon Concept Meteorite
description: Yes I'm being followed by a moonshadow. Moonshadow, moonshadow.
content: If you ever look up at the warm tones of a full moon and think, "man, I wish I could have a bit of that on my wrist," well, H. Moser has you covered. No, the new Streamliner Perpetual Moon Concept Meteorite is not made of moon rock (the name should m... [1843 chars]
